recipesJson.name: Cherry in the Kuchen with Lewis
recipesJson.author: TamVapes
recipesJson.description:
A Cherry in the Kuchen with Lewis

Kuchen means Cake in German. This recipe is for Lewis from Chef's Flavours in the UK. 
This is made with all Chefs flavors except the SASAMI Crumble Cake.   I. goofed on that one. Oops. ðŸ˜€ Enjoy.
